availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas P. Jones (Union County, KY, carpenter)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, carpenter, farmer, and fugitive from justice. Virginia native. Son of William Jones. Carpenter in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Union County in 1860. Farmer in Union County in June 1863. Indicted for murder in Union County in October 1865. Fugitive from justice in Posey County, Indiana, in October 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 508B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 544.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Union County, KY, June 1863, p. 78.
KYR-0001-006-0085.
